hibernate-mapping.sql-query:
SELECT sum(EOOI.EOOI_QUANTITY) as QUANTITY, EOOI.EOOI_ORDER_NO, EOOI.EOOI_CODE, EOOI.EOOI_NAME, EOOI.ORG_ID
FROM EO_ORDER_ITEM EOOI WHERE 1=1 AND EOOI.REC_STATUS=0 <<AND EOOI.EOOI_ORDER_NO in(:eooiOrderNos)>> <<AND EOOI.ORG_ID=:orgId>> group by EOOI.EOOI_ORDER_NO, EOOI.EOOI_CODE, EOOI.EOOI_NAME, EOOI.ORG_ID
